product_name: The North Face Buckland Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: Made with heavyweight-but-soft cotton canvas, reinforced seams and extra rivets at the pocket corners, The North Face Buckland casual pants with 30 in. inseam are designed for years of use and abuse. Gusseted inseam allows great freedom of movement. Reinforcement at the back hems improves the durability of high-wear areas. The North Face Buckland pants feature hand pockets and rear patch pockets.
short_description: Made with heavyweight-but-soft cotton canvas, reinforced seams and extra rivets at the pocket corners, The North Face Buckland casual pants with 30 in. inseam are designed for years of use and abuse.
